body_content.explanation: abbreviation for card security code: a number on a credit card or debit card (= a card used for payment), usually three digits (= individual numbers) on the back of the card, that is used to prove that the person making the payment has the card in their possession:
examples: The CSC is not printed on any receipts, so it is not likely to be known by anyone other than the actual card owner.
Can I have the CSC number from the back of your card, please?
